message: explain JMBGRP ISMS POL TR Training Policy Procedure v1.2
response:
The purpose of the JMBGRP ISMS POL TR Training Policy Procedure v1.2 is to ensure that information security is integrated into the organization's culture for successful implementation, maintenance, and continuous improvement of information security best practices.

The policy applies to all employees, including business owners, custodians, system administrators, software developers, and users of JMBGRP information.

The policy statement mandates that all employees, contractors, and third-party users receive appropriate information security awareness training and regular updates on organizational information security policies and procedures relevant to their job functions. New employees receive information security training during induction, and periodic training is conducted at least once a year.

*   Purpose
*   Scope
*   Definitions/Terms and Definition/Normative Reference
*   Policy Statement/Policy/Policies
*   Procedure
*   Responsibilities
*   References/Introduction
*   Enforcement
